column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A shooting incident ocurred at around 3 am on April 26
column5: along Street 51 in front of Sorya Mall in Sangkat Phsar Thmey 3
column7: Phnom Penh. (*Photos show what looks like ‘Guy Station’ bar)------A man was shot twice by a group of suspects
column9: the victim was seen walking out of a house in front of three or four suspects and a fight appeared to break out. Two shots were fired
column10: and the men escaped on two motorbikes (without a license plate)
column11: fled the scene. Local authorities arrived and interrogated those who saw the incident and collected bullet casings.------The victim was immediately taken by ambulance to hospital. ------AREY
